name: A Basic Platformer
description:
This is a very basic concept I've spent time on and just wanted to see the thoughts, the hope now is that soon ill continue work on the project however for now will be left as a prototype. 

I know there are bugs and the players animations are very strange and limited but it's simply an idea- more or less just wanted to hear feedback on the simple mechanics. 

The plan is to move onto a top dow, aciton game which I'm going to be sure to develop fiurther than this. 

The Controls: 

A = Left

D= Right

R= Reload

Space= Jump

Left Click = Shoot

Escape= Main Menu, left click on menu buttons while in main menu or leve menu. 

Hope you enjoy!

- Jared.
